message_1: A transposition cipher takes every 3rd character of a plaintext message and swaps its position with the character immediately to its right. If the original message was "HELLO WORLD", what is the resulting ciphertext?
message_2:
To apply the transposition cipher, we will swap every 3rd character with the character to its right in the message "HELLO WORLD". 

1. Swap L (3rd character) with L (4th character): HE_LL_O WOR_LD
2. Swap O (6th character) with W (7th character): HELL_OW_ORLD

The resulting ciphertext is "HELLOWORLD".
